Package bfsztg_gui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AboutMenuAction
    When the player selects the about option from the menu bar, it shows a short information about the authors.
    ArcherActionListener
    Called when the player activates the Archer button.
    CavalryActionListener
    Called when the player activates the Cavalry button.
    ConnectMenuAction
    Action listener for the connect menu option.
    DefendActionListener
    Called when the player activates the defend button on the right button bar.
    EndTurnActionListener
    Called when the player activates the end turn button on the right button bar.
    ExitMenuAction
    Used for the close menu option.
    GameCanvasMouseListener
    Listens on mouse click events on the Game Canvas (which is in the middle of the screen with the hexagons), then gives the processed information to the game logic.
    GameCanvasPanel
    The class of the map in the center of the GUI window.
    GameImages
    The class which initalizes and holds the graphic images for the game.
    GraphicCell
    A class with enums for the terrain, unit and marker types.
    GUI
    Class of the Battle for Szoftvertechnologia General GUI Contains the GameCanvasPanel in the middle, a chat panel on the bottom and a button bar on the right side.
    HelpMenuAction
    Shows a help window when the help option is selected from the menu bar.
    HostMenuAction
    Action listener for the host menu option.
    InfantryActionListener
    Called when the player activates the Infantry button.
    SendChatActionListener
    Called when the Send button is clicked on the bottom of the chat panel.
    WaitActionListener
    Called when the player activates the wait button on the right button bar.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GameCanvasPanel.Recruit
    An enum containing the recruitable types of units.
    GraphicCell.Marker
    Available marker types.
    GraphicCell.Terrain
    Currently available terrain tile types.
    GraphicCell.Unit
    Available unit types.
